long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finds text in Hebrew script (modern Hebrew letters) on any page and converts it to Paleo-Hebrew script, also known as Phoenician.

The Paleo-Hebrew script is the first alphabet and the one that was originally used for Hebrew text, until the modern "Ashuri" alphabet become more common from roughly the 3rd century BCE. 

This extension can help Hebrew-readers practice to read the script fluently and / or simply enjoy it at almost any website.
